statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:GCPGroup) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP IAM Groups that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})-[r:RESOURCE]->(:GCPGroups) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP Customer to IAM Groups relationships that are out of date
